name: BNNSArithmeticBinary
desc: A structure that contains the inputs and output of an arithmetic operation with two inputs.

items.name: init(in1: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, in1_type: BNNSDescriptorType, in2: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, in2_type: BNNSDescriptorType, out: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor, out_type: BNNSDescriptorType)
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic structure that takes two inputs from the specified parameters.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Returns a new arithmetic structure that takes two inputs.

items.name: var in1: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the first input.

items.name: var in1_type: BNNSDescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the first input.

items.name: var in2: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor
items.desc: The descriptor of the second input.

items.name: var in2_type: BNNSDescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the second input.

items.name: var out_type: BNNSDescriptorType
items.desc: The descriptor type of the output.
